name: Hack Inspection
description:
Theme: Inspired by a Movie, TV show, etc.

Our inspiration: SpongeBob and Breaking Bad

In Hack Inspection, you must infiltrate the restaurant, The Great Impasta, by posing as a fake health inspector. By sabotaging different appliances around the restaurant, you distract the manager, leaving his computer open. This allows your partner, The Hacker to break into the computer and get the code to the safe containing the secret recipe.

Controls

A & D = Left & Right

E = Interact / Exit puzzle

Left Click = Used in puzzle interactions

Tab = Open / Close clipboard

Esc = Pause
